answerText: Popul Vuh[10] The Popul Vuh is a collection of myths about this Mesoamerican culture, whose Long Count Calendar supposedly predicts the end of the world on December 21, 2012.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Michigan A + George Mason | 20 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The central characters of this work squeeze themselves into their blowguns in the House of Bats, with one of them suffering instant decapitation by Camazotz as he peeks outside. For 10 points each: [10] Name this text which was discovered and preserved by the Dominician priest Francisco Ximenez. Its central characters are Hunahpu and Xbalanque (shuh buh LAWN kay), the Hero Twins.
